Occasionally we produce papers which provide background, foundation, or supplemental information about the topics covered by the Eiffel documentation. Although the material in these papers might be of interest to many Eiffel users, they might not be suitable in their current form for inclusion in the mainstream documentation books. 

You will find a collection of these papers in this book.
